page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: In 1985 a normal day of childs life is like waking up,having a wash,breakfast,getting dressed andthen going to school.School finishes at about 3.30pm.After school some people have hobbies like Brownies,Guides,Gymnastics,swimming etc. Once we get home we may go out play with our friends or have tea. Sometimes we have friends to tea.If we are lucky we have friend around to spend the night. In the holidays if we think the weather is nice we might be taken out to the seaside orsomewhere else.If it is rainy we normally stay in and watch T.V. or play a game.Sometimes we might help our mother do some housework or help our dad clean the car or do the garden.
